abstract: Thai Prime Min Prayuth Chan-ocha requests three-way meeting with Myanmar and Malaysia about human trafficking in region in wake of discovery of mass grave in southern Thailand containing 33 bodies.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Prayuth Chan-ocha on Friday called for a three-way meeting with Malaysia and Myanmar to try to resolve a regional human trafficking crisis

headline.print_headline: Asia; Thailand: Urgent Plea Over Trafficking

snippet: Prime Minister Prayuth Chan-ocha on Friday called for a three-way meeting with Malaysia and Myanmar to try to resolve a regional human trafficking crisis

keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
